segments.text: I am keen on a coat on www.dingding.com . But it requires having an online banking account . Is it necessary ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Indeed . Online banking enables you to make on-line shopping .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know how to get the bank account ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Bring your ID card and fill out a form . That will be fine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think online banking can change your money habits and it is quicker than ATM processing speed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My shopping life will be more convenient .
segments.speaker: S1
